channel.title: Hola! Ian Landsman from UserScape
channel.description:
Hello everyone.
I'm not too good at these intro posts, but here's a wee bit of background. In 2005 I started [UserScape][1], we build customer service tools. Currently [HelpSpot][2] (enterprise help desk) and [Snappy][3] (email support for small teams). As you may be aware, I also host the [Bootstrapped.fm][4] podcast with [Andrey][5].
The Bootstrapping community is going through a bit of a resurgence recently and I'm really excited about the possibilities for this forum to help foster that growth.
[1]: http://www.userscape.com [2]: http://www.helpspot.com [3]: http://besnappy.com [4]: http://bootstrapped.fm [5]: http://discuss.bootstrapped.fm/t/hello-im-andrey-my-software-company-is-antair/11

item.title: Hola! Ian Landsman from UserScape
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
Hello everyone.

I’m not too good at these intro posts, but here’s a wee bit of background. In 2005 I started UserScape, we build customer service tools. Currently HelpSpot (enterprise help desk) and Snappy (email support for small teams). As you may be aware, I also host the Bootstrapped.fm podcast with Andrey.

The Bootstrapping community is going through a bit of a resurgence recently and I’m really excited about the possibilities for this forum to help foster that growth.
